scripts.lint: npm run license && eslint --fix --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern src/ test/
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run bundle && ncp appsscript.json dist/appsscript.json
scripts.deploy: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build && ncp .clasp-dev.json .clasp.json && clasp push -f && clasp deploy -i AKfycbwf7HIt4NTEyJAMPACPS7BGBiq9CJ14wg0jBwjWdj6yCLz9wdWkmzN0PjdqzpnCUBWrSA
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build && ncp .clasp-prod.json .clasp.json && clasp push -f && clasp deploy -i AKfycbysS9XmULaZ9HtsLjWDYKrEuNZ7ws9xtK-Qmy3jbNfrCKYXU3upWYybefshFlX2ypfG
scripts.deploy:bvs: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build && ncp .clasp-bvs.json .clasp.json && clasp push -f && clasp deploy -i AKfycbyNWSZa57KCoMxkBaf0ie4BykQOlp77wIkS_np_f8QskVrmD8jju95MiQxXwclA77p9ug
